title: Professions 1
sentences: My brother is a doctor and works in the hospital.
trae la comida a la mesa.
The waiter brings the food to the table.
She is a very famous writer.
The cook prepares a delicious dinner.
My best friend wants to be a firefighter.
conduce el autobús por la ciudad.
The driver drives the bus through the city.
The shop assistant sells clothes in the shop.
The mechanic fixes my car today.
My aunt is a nurse in a small clinic.
The dentist looks at my teeth.
Are you a student at the university?
The photographer takes very beautiful photos.
corta el pelo a los clientes.
The hairdresser cuts the customers' hair.
pinta las paredes de la casa.
The painter paints the walls of the house.
My cousin is a lawyer and has a lot of work.
The baker makes fresh bread every morning.
The journalist writes news for the newspaper.
The gardener takes care of the flowers in the park.
My neighbor is a police officer and helps people.
The musician plays the guitar very well.
contesta el teléfono en la oficina.
The secretary answers the phone in the office.
The seller works in the central market.
Do you want to talk to the boss of the company?
The pilot flies very large planes.
The veterinarian cures the sick dogs.
trabaja en el teatro y en el cine.
The actor works in the theater and in the cinema.
dibuja los planos de los edificios.
The architect draws the plans for the buildings.
dictionary:
El médico / La médica - The doctor
El profesor / La profesora - The teacher
El camarero / La camarera - The waiter/waitress
El cocinero / La cocinera - The cook
El conductor / La conductora - The driver
El dependiente / La dependienta - The shop assistant
El enfermero / La enfermera - The nurse
El mecánico / La mecánica - The mechanic
El peluquero / La peluquera - The hairdresser
El jefe / La jefa - The boss
